title: The Clever Tortoise
story: Once upon a time in an Igbo village, there was a clever tortoise. He wanted to outsmart the animals.

title: The Wise Elephant
story: Once upon a time, a wise elephant ruled the jungle. He was loved by all animals for his fairness.

title: The Brave Hunter
story: Once upon a time, in a northern village, there was a brave hunter. He faced a lion with great courage.
